Plannit is a new product being developed to help students manage their work efficiently and effectively. The product will contain enrolled classes, associated assignments, and calendar view of assignments and class times.\n\n The organization is the main basis for Plannit. This software aids students in organizing their work for their enrolled classes. In addition, assignments can be viewed in several formats including calendar view weekly and daily.

The courses listed are those provided by the university as well as additions suggested by users. \n\nIf you would like your course to be included, fill out the form for course addition. Your submission will be reviewed and verified. If it is authorized then your course will be added to the list.
At this time, custom courses are not supported. That is a feature that may be added in the future if enough users would like to have it.
